Shadai's Disciple Kaysia:
Oh, hello! My Name is Kaysia. Nice to meet you.
I'm Shadai's apprentice, but I work not only in the smithy. You know, I don't like to sit still, hehe. When I was traveling I found special Atelia, and now when I have a free time I study Blood Sword Akamanah and Deminic Sword Zariche.
Kelbims's Atelia Fragment, Zariche's Blood, and Akamanah's Blood are unusual items. As a token of my gratitude, I can craft a weapon from Klebim's Atelia Fragment for you.
By the Way!, Also I work on Kelbim Weapon crystallization, so if you need Kelbim Crystal just ask me for it. Besides, if you bring me Blood-thirsty weaapon along with either Zariche's Blood or Akamanah's Blood , I will craft Blood-stained weapon. So, what do you think?
